i'm italian and let me tell you, you've most likely been eating spaghetti with tomato sauce the wrong way either by using a crappy product or by cooking it the wrong way.

believe me if u cook it in the rite way it will taste delicious

​

try to buy some fresh pomodori pachino dop (its like little tomatoes called pachino dop is important which means the quality of the tomato is recognized)

then get a fresh  basil plant thats in a pot with soil,

half a clove of garlic, dice it up

olive oil extra virgin

parmesan/pecorino mix 50%50

im telling u with these ingredients if u slow cook them all in a pan with a cover then when pasta is boiled and ready heat up the sauce and the pasta at high eat and jump it

dont put the cheese in the pan though, just grate it at the end on ur plate of pasta

​

also 2 leaves of basil diced up, suffice throw em in at the end when ur jumping the pasta

​

also u might wanna put some salt and pepper in the sauce
